title: Can I use Saudi Arabian eSIM or 2 physical SIM cards on pixel 4?
content: I will be switching to Pixel 4XL soon but I'm just wondering if I can add Saudi eSIM to the phone. If not, will the phone be supporting 2 nano physical SIM cards (Dual-SIM dual-standby).
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
